subject: Procurement of ex-servicemen for fee collection from the office of Directorate General of Resettlement (DGR)
text: 9rr 74v <TMHT wfeazot 444 /Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (4at 9art, 734 qar= 37 Tronf TAa4) 448 91-11-25093507 25093514 TtT National Highways Authority of India QTH. /Exto:2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 0 6, #rer-10, E1rGT, 7 fir7ft-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/22/07-08 /CMD-CO/DGR(VoL.IV) 23.5.2008 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCOMMERCIAL OPERATIONSL96 This circular is issued in supercession of circular no/ _ 94 dated 1.5.2008 and in continuation to our circular no_ 88 dated 15.6.2007 . 4 standardized assessment sheet to judge the suitability of the ex-servicemen during interview is enclosed. All PDs/ PIUs are requested to strictly follow the criteria as per assessment sheet during the selection process, to ensure uniformity, transparency and recording of the assessment by the committee. While issuing interview letters, sponsored ex-servicemen must be asked to the following documents in original and attested /notarised photocopy to verify and form the basis for marking along with financial bids: - 1 . Retired Officer's Identity Card 2 . Pension order (PPO) 3. Retirement Medical Certificate 4 DGR Registration Certificate 5 . University Degree 6. Certificate in support of computer knowledge 7 _ 1Oth class certificate of the Board in support of local language knowledge 8. Detail of Present establishment and proof of manpower (last audited balance sheet etc ) 9_ Scroll of Gallantry / Presidential Award. This issues with approval of Competent Authority and is to come into force with immediate effect, Vinay Kauskal Capt, Geheral Manager (CO) To All PIUs / CMUs to_ 1_ All Members / CGMs/ CVO 2. All GMs 3 PS to Chairman 4 Director   (Self Employment) Director General Resettlement, Government of  India, Ministry of Defence , New Delhi 5_ Librarian Encls: As above Z:IGM(COJIDGM(COIDGR Vol. VLdoc {Fax ~ NHAL New bring Pay Gp Copy
